Description: Year the property was listed for sale
Date the sale was recorded locally
Value of the property used for local tax assesment
Amount the property was sold for
Ratio of the sale price to the assessed value
Type of property including: Residential, Commercial, Industrial, Apartments, Vacant, etc
Indicates whether property is single or multifamily residential
Non usable sale code typically means the sale price is not reliable for use in the determination of a property value. See attachments in the dataset description page for a listing of codes
